 interface UpdateProgressResponse
          The service response to a call to AchievementsClient.updateProgress() Includes unlocked status of the achievement and the information encapsulated in the generic RequestResponse

 interface GetLeaderboardPercentilesResponse
          Response object for getting leaderboard percentiles for a leaderboard.
 interface GetLeaderboardsResponse
          A response to a request to get all leaderboards for a game Encapsulates the lists of uniqueID's and names of the leaderboards
 interface GetPlayerScoreResponse
          The response object returned after a call to RequestPlayerScore Extends RequestResponse and encapsulates the data requested and information about the results of the request
 interface GetScoresResponse
          A response to a request to get scores from a leaderboard Encapsulates a list of RankedScores along with meta-information about the leaderboard they came from
 interface SubmitScoreResponse
          A response to a request to submit a score to a leaderboard.
